my-games.title: My Games

confirmation-modal.title: Surrender
confirmation-modal.description: Are you sure you want to surrender the game #{{gameId}}? There is no way to undo this action.

create-game.stage-3: Minting game token to your account

table.gameOver-top5-msj: Great job! You're in the top 5! Keep it up!

error-labels.error-shortUsername-login: Username must be at least 3 characters
error-labels.error-longUsername-login: Username must be at most 15 characters
error-labels.error-invalidUsername-login: Username must contain only letters, numbers, points or dashes

confirmation-modal.description: Are you sure you want to sell this special card for ¢{{price}}? There is no way to undo this action.
